title: Ant McPartlin and Anne-Marie Corbett take their dogs for a walk
text:
Much of their time together is spent walking their dogs.

And Ant McPartlin and his girlfriend Anne-Marie Corbett were back out again to take their Maltipoo puppies and his huge chocolate Labrador Hurley for a walk in London on Thursday.

The TV host looked smitten with the PA, both 43, in typically low-key fashion while donning country-inspired ensembles while they walked to the park.

Time for a walk: Ant McPartlin enjoyed a relaxed outing with girlfriend Anne-Marie Corbett as they took their Maltipoo puppies and Labrador Hurley for a walk in London on Thursday

Anne-Marie kept the cold weather at bay by wrapping up in an oversized grey padded jacket, which she wore over a pair of black leggings.

Stepping out in a pair of dark brown boots, the beauty opted to forgo wearing any accessories but had a pair of sunglasses perched on her coat.

Her blonde locks were pulled back into a sleek bun, and Anne-Marie wore a light palette of make-up to highlight her pretty features.

Meanwhile Ant wore a black-and-blue plaid fleece jacket, which he paired with dark denim jeans and black trainers.

Casual: The TV host looked smitten with the PA, both 43, in typically low-key fashion while donning country-inspired ensembles while they walked to the park

Cosy: Anne-Marie kept the cold weather at bay by wrapping up in an oversized grey padded jacket, which she wore over a pair of black leggings

Keeping it casual: Meanwhile Ant wore a black-and-blue plaid fleece jacket, which he paired with dark denim jeans and black trainers

It comes as it's been reported that Anne-Marie - whom he calls his 'rock' - will be by his side when he jets out to Oz for his return to I’m A Celeb!

The Mail on Sunday revealed that Anne-Marie is planning to accompany him to Queensland from November, for the month that filming on the ITV show takes. And she may take her two daughters, too.

A source told The Mail on Sunday: ‘Ant has formed a strong bond with Anne-Marie’s children – he loves kids and he is embracing having a family around him. They, in turn, want to support him as he makes his comeback on I’m A Celeb.

‘All eyes will be on him after he took last year off, so it is a fairly big deal for him. He has had a very difficult couple of years.’

Chic: Stepping out in a pair of dark brown boots, Anne-Marie opted to forgo wearing any accessories but had a pair of sunglasses perched on her coat

Pretty: Her blonde locks were pulled back into a sleek bun, and Anne-Marie wore a light palette of make-up to highlight her pretty features

Delighted: Ant couldn't help but smile as he enjoyed the outing with Anne-Marie and the dogs

Ant took a year off his TV work to seek treatment after admitting being over the drink-drive limit when he was involved in a car crash in London in March last year.

He returned to screens alongside his co-presenter and friend Declan Donnelly for the last series of Britain’s Got Talent earlier this year.

Holly Willoughby stepped in to front last year’s I’m A Celebrity show with Dec, and took her three children – Harry, ten, Belle, eight and four-year-old Chester – with her.

She also employed a tutor to ensure they didn’t get left behind with their school work – an arrangement Ms Corbett is also said to be considering.

Holly said last year: ‘I’ve had to be really clear with them, they can play for a couple of hours but none of us are on holiday. We’re all doing work. The headmaster was amazing [for letting the kids go].’

Before and after: The pair were seen taking their pets into and out of the park carefully

Heading out: After their relaxing walk, Ant and Anne-Marie drove home
description: The TV host looked smitten with the PA, both 43, in typically low-key fashion while donning country-inspired ensembles while they walked to the park in London on Thursday.
